statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 24 \\ -6 \\ 16 \\ -14 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
